about_the_game:
What kind of hobby or job tickles your fancy? Want to become a farmer? Or maybe a chef? Well, it's time to make this dream a reality.

Get the job pass to unlock new exclusive items and level ups that are related to your favorite activities on the island. Every job comes with its own special skin, increased coin returns per quest solved related to the activity, and more items that can be used to decorate your environment.

We will launch with 4 job options to choose from.
